perturbation.original_text: Network Affiliate shall use commercially reasonable efforts to ensure that all Equipment delivered to any Theatre or otherwise in the possession, custody or control of Network Affiliate is secure and not accessible by authorized third parties.
perturbation.changed_text: Network Affiliate should attempt to ensure that all Equipment delivered to any Theatre or otherwise in the possession, custody or control of Network Affiliate is reasonably secure.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'shall use commercially reasonable efforts to ensure' with 'should attempt to ensure' weakens the obligation, making security efforts discretionary. Further, replacing 'secure and not accessible by authorized third parties' with 'reasonably secure' introduces ambiguity, as the definition of 'reasonably secure' is subjective. This weakens the explicit security requirement.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA)

perturbation.original_text: Network Affiliate shall cause its employees to attend such training and to follow the instructions given by NCM in such training as well as in follow-up instructions, guidelines and manuals of any kind provided to Network Affiliate by NCM.
perturbation.changed_text: Network Affiliate may encourage its employees to attend such training and to generally consider the instructions given by NCM in such training, as well as follow-up instructions, guidelines and manuals of any kind provided to Network Affiliate by NCM.
perturbation.explanation: Changing 'shall cause its employees to attend' to 'may encourage its employees to attend' makes employee attendance optional. Replacing 'follow the instructions' with 'generally consider the instructions' weakens the requirement to adhere to NCM's instructions. This introduces ambiguity and makes compliance discretionary.

perturbation.original_text: Network Affiliate and NCM shall at all times operate and conduct its business, including, without limitation, exercising its rights under this Agreement, in compliance with all applicable international, national, state, and local laws, rules, and requirements.
perturbation.changed_text: Network Affiliate and NCM shall endeavor to operate and conduct its business, including, without limitation, exercising its rights under this Agreement, in general accordance with applicable international, national, state, and local laws, rules, and requirements.
perturbation.explanation: Replacing 'shall at all times operate...in compliance' with 'shall endeavor to operate...in general accordance' significantly weakens the commitment to full legal compliance. 'Endeavor' implies an attempt rather than a guarantee, and 'general accordance' suggests flexibility in adhering to the laws. This introduces ambiguity and makes adherence to the law discretionary.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Varies based on specific legal context
